ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And whosoever has done even an atom's weight of evil will behold that.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And whoso doeth ill an atom's weight) the weight of a small atom (will see it then) is written in his register and will displease him; and it is also said: the believer sees it in the life of the world while the disbeliever sees it in the Hereafter'.
